decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The use hereby permitted shall be discontinued and the land restored to its former condition on or before 31st May 2015.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (Received 22/12/2014: AC75_P_001, Existing Site Location Plan, Technical Note: Temporary Storage; Received 23/03/2015: Management Plan for Temporary Storage at 871 Great West Road) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority.

Condition : 3 - The use hereby permitted for storage (Class B8) purposes shall not be carried on outside the following times: 08.00-17.30 Monday to Friday and 09.00-13.00 Saturdays, and at no time on Sundays, Public or Bank Holidays.

Condition : 4 - No deliveries shall be taken at, or despatched from, the site outside the hours of 09.30-16.00 Monday-Friday or 09.30-13.00 Saturdays, nor at any time on Sundays, Bank or Public Holidays.
description: Temporary use of vacant site as storage use (Class B8) for limit of 3 months
